from notebookutils import mssparkutils

# Builds protected characteristic DIMs
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/diversity_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/disability_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/religion_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/sxo_dim')
# Builds protected characteristic FACT
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/secureinfo_fact') #-- where is it?

# Builds employee DIMS
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/employee_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/PersonnelArea_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/PersonnelSubArea_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/EmployeeLeavers_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/WorkSchedule_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/Specialism_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/LeaveEntitlement_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/Absence_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/contract_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/payband_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/position_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/PINS_Location_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/OrganisationUnit_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/CostCenter_Dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/Employee_HR_Hierarchy_Dim')

# Build full FACT table
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/HR_Record_Fact')
